mapper.select: select cp.id,cp.display_id,cp.cid,cp.pid,cp.peid,cp.display_title,cp.color from contest_problem cp,problem p where cp.cid = #{cid} and cp.pid=p.id and p.auth!=2 order by CAST(cp.display_id AS SIGNED),cp.display_id ASC

select cp.display_id as problem_id,cp.pid,cp.display_title as title from contest_problem cp,problem p where cp.cid = #{cid} and cp.pid = p.id and p.auth != 2 order by CAST(cp.display_id AS SIGNED),cp.display_id ASC
